contentList.content: Force to be Reckoned With

Embrace Kereska's Force to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Your force spells deal additional Force damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Force, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Disintegrate">Disintegrate</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
Using the Force (of Kereska)

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Its force spells deal additional Force damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Force, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Disintegrate">Disintegrate</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>.
Resplendent Dawn

Embrace Kereska's Radiance to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. Your radiant spells deal additional Radiant damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Radiance, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Sunbeam">Sunbeam</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_GuidingBolt">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.
Basking in Kereska's Radiance

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. Its radiant spells deal additional Radiant damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, inflict [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Radiance, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Sunbeam">Sunbeam</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_GuidingBolt">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target.
Undying Blight

Embrace Kereska's Necrosis to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Your necrotic spells deal additional Necrotic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_ANCIENTLAIR_CURSE">Spell Rot</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Necrosis, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CircleOfDeath">Circle of Death</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Blight">Blight</LSTag>.
Spreading Kereska's Necrosis

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Its necrotic spells deal additional Necrotic damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_ANCIENTLAIR_CURSE">Spell Rot</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Necrosis, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CircleOfDeath">Circle of Death</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Blight">Blight</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_ANCIENTLAIR_CURSE">Spell Rot</LSTag> upon the target.
Fractured Psyche

Embrace Kereska's Psychosis to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage. Your psychic spells deal additional Psychic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_PSYCHIC_MENTAL_FATIGUE">Mental Fatigue</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Psychosis, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PhantasmalKiller">Phantasmal Killer</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DissonantWhispers">Dissonant Whispers</LSTag>.
Unleashing Kereska's Psychosis

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage. Its psychic spells deal additional Psychic damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, inflict [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_PSYCHIC_MENTAL_FATIGUE">Mental Fatigue</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Psychosis, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PhantasmalKiller">Phantasmal Killer</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DissonantWhispers">Dissonant Whispers</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_PSYCHIC_MENTAL_FATIGUE">Mental Fatigue</LSTag> upon the target.
